Daily meteorology data were collected from 194 meteorological observation stations in China, which is available from the Chinese Meteorological Data Sharing Service System ( 12, 17). In the analysis, we included five major meteorological indicators: temperature, relative humidity, precipitation, sunshine hours, and pressure. Heat index (HI) was further estimated using the regression equation proposed by Rothfusz ( 18).
HI = − 42.379 + 2.04901523*T +10.14333127*RH − 0.22475541*T*RH − 0.00683783*T*T − 0.05481717*RH*RH +
0.00122874*T*T*RH + 0.00085282*T*RH*RH − 0.00000199*T*T*RH*RH
